snippet: The first of three ships that are expected to spend up to a year hunting for the wreckage arrived in the search area in the Indian Ocean about 1,100 miles west of Australia.
abstract: Hunt for Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 resumes; first of three ships that are expected to spend up to a year hunting for the wreckage arrive in search area in the Indian Ocean about 1,100 miles west of Australia.
lead_paragraph: The first of three ships that are expected to spend up to a year hunting for the wreckage arrived in the search area in the Indian Ocean about 1,100 miles west of Australia.

headline.main: Search Resumes for Missing Malaysia Jet
